Name: Average time from Awaiting Assignment to Batch to Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to be followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total resolution time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch across all cases ending with SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Accept occurs

Name: Time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that include major or minor revisions
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average waiting time to the Awaiting Assignment to Batch after First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time between First Look-Please submit updates and Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch after the execution of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until Awaiting Assignment to Batch is performed following a revised manuscript submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Cycle Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch measured from the immediately preceding activity in each variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Awaiting Assignment to Batch and the end of the case

Name: Total time from Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in cases where RW-EIC Accept occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to occur after First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-EIC Accept and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in high-performance variants (performance < 100000)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that originate from SW–Major Revision due in 1 week versus SW–Minor Revision due in 1 week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Awaiting Assignment to Batch and the end of the case
